articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Leaves
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, left here on Wednesday to visit South Africa and Zimbabwe.
					 He was accompanied by Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun and other suite members.

articles.title: Talks between FMs of DPRK and Cuba Held
articles.content:
Talks between FMs of DPRK and Cuba Held
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Talks between Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK who is leading the government delegation on a visit to Cuba, and Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, Cuban foreign minister, were held in Havana on May 4.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and from the opposite side a vice-minister of Foreign Affairs and officials concerned.
					
					 At the talks both sides discussed the matter of further developing the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries and exchanged views on the international issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: DPRK and Cuban Foreign Ministries Agree to Cooperate
articles.content:
DPRK and Cuban Foreign Ministries Agree to Cooperate
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- An agreement on cooperation between the foreign ministries of the DPRK and Cuba was signed in Havana on May 4.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the government delegation led by Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on a visit to Cuba and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and from the opposite side were Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla and a vice-minister of Foreign Affairs and officials concerned.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun and Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla signed the agreement.

articles.title: Measures against Swine Flu Taken in DPRK
articles.content:
Measures against Swine Flu Taken in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is intensifying preventive actions against swine flu on high alert for the influenza spreading rapidly in the world.
					Pak Myong Su, vice-chairman of the State Emergency Anti-epidemic Commission, had an interview with KCNA regarding the state measures taken against A/H1N1 flu.
					
					Reporter: Would you tell me about the state measures taken against A/H1N1 influenza spreading widely in Mexico, the United States and many other countries?
					
					Vice-chairman: For the present, the foreigners entering our country, especially those from the outbreak areas, are strictly quarantined in the frontier and those who are suspected to have been infected are under medical surveillance in isolation until they have been confirmed.
					
					Along with this, an emergency measure is being taken to store anti-virus medicines to cope with the possible outbreak of the disease. The check-up of pork and its products, to say nothing of wild boars, is being strengthened as never before.
					
					Research to develop vaccine is being pushed ahead forcefully at the same time.
					
					Meanwhile, TVs and publications inform the people of details of A/H1N1 flu outbreak in various countries and its situation in time.
					
					Medical workers keep in touch with the residents in charge almost every day to check up them and bring home hygienic information such as common sense of the influenza and prevention methods to them.
					
					A diagnosis system for distinguishing common cold from the A/H1N1 influenza has been established and a system to report the outbreak of disease has also been set up from the centre down to the local areas.
					
					Reporter: Is there any case of the disease in the country?
					
					Vice-chairman: Not yet the country has witnessed any case.

articles.title: Crude Liquor and Rice-Malt Sweet Drinks Contest Held
articles.content:
Crude Liquor and Rice-Malt Sweet Drinks Contest Held
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang city contest of crude liquor and sweet drinks prepared with rice and malt was held on Tuesday.
					 The contest brought together more than 20 organizations and factories selected from various catering units and housewives in Pyongyang.
					
					 They presented more than 100 varieties of drinks they have prepared in the course of finding out the original methods of making crude liquor and sweet drinks with rice and malt and putting their processing on a scientific basis.
					
					 Crude liquor made with glutinous rice, polished rice, corn and wheat, etc. presented by Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant, Pyongyang Koryo Hotel, Munsu Restaurant, the Taedonggang Beer Brewery and the Pyongyang Children's Cake Factory drew attention of experts and visitors as they retained fresh relish while preserving sour taste and hazy color with moderate alcoholic contents handed down from the time immemorial.
					
					 Highly appreciated there was the experience gained by restaurants and housewives in Pyongyang in preparing sweet drinks with scorched rice at the bottom of pot, washings of rice or noodle and other by-products of grains.
					
					 Also introduced at the contest were methods of making crude liquor and sweet drinks with potato, sweet potato, Insam, adlay, green gram, etc. which may enhance medical efficiency of drinks while cutting down the consumption of grains.

articles.title: Posters Produced
articles.content:
Posters Produced
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House, the Mansudae Art Studio and the Korean Central Fine Arts Studio produced various posters inspiringly encouraging the whole party and country and all the people to the 150-day campaign.
					 Depicted in the posters are the fluttering red flags on which such letters are written as "Let us all turn out in the 150-day campaign!", "Let us become victors of honor in the 150-day campaign!", "Great prosperous and powerful nation" and "Great revolutionary surge", and the working class raising the torch of Kangson and so forth. They well represent the strong aspiration and will of the army and people of the DPRK to win a great victory in the nation-wide vigorous campaign, holding high the torch of great revolutionary surge.
					
					 Among the posters are "Let us dash on a swift horse to make a leap forward!" and "Let us work new miracles in the 150-day campaign under the torch of Kangson!", which depict the working people dashing on the Chollima of Songun and the workers of Kangson tightly holding a metal rod. They earnestly call upon all the people to demonstrate the dignity and honor of heroic Korea in the ongoing campaign.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea who visited the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, said that the Korean people and the progressive people of the world significantly commemorated the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung as the most auspicious holiday. Expressing his ardent reverence for the President, he said:
					 Whenever the Day of the Sun comes every year, we, adherents to the Juche idea, regard it as the noblest moral obligation to visit the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the holy temple of Juche, where the President, the founder of the Juche idea and the eternal sun of humankind, lies in state, and pay homage to him. 
					
					 The President was the great man born of Heaven to save the humankind from all sorts of evils and misfortune and the Korean people from the Japanese imperialists' domination and subjugation. 
					
					 The President was, indeed, the great leader of the people who pursued politics, always giving primary consideration to the people's happiness. 
					
					 He performed immortal feats by dedicating all his life to the global peace and the human cause of independence. 
					
					 That is why, not only the Korean people but the progressive people of the world are highly praising the President as the outstanding thinker and theoretician and eternal sun of humankind. 
					
					The revolutionary cause of Juche started by the President has been successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has perfectly personified the idea, ever-victorious leadership art and noblest virtues of the President.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is highly praised by the progressive people of the world as the outstanding leader in the 21st century. 
					
					 Only victory and glory are always in store for the Korean people dynamically accelerating the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: U.S. Wholly to Blame for New Global Arms Race
articles.content:
U.S. Wholly to Blame for New Global Arms Race
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Recently, U.S. Secretary of Defense Gates announced that the U.S. is contemplating spending 534 billion U.S. dollars for the defense purpose in the fiscal 2010. This is much bigger than the total defense spending of 25 countries of the world or about a four percent increase over the defense budget in the fiscal 2009.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. stepped-up arms expansion is an act of disturbing peace as it escalates the worldwide arms race and military confrontation while aggravating the international situation. 
					
					 Citing facts to prove that a big share of the U.S. defense spending goes to the development and production of new type weapons, the commentary says this compels other countries to develop weapons to counter them.
					
					 The U.S. is chiefly to blame for the new global arms race, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has neither right nor justification to say this or that about the efforts of other countries to bolster their capabilities for self-defence. 
					
					 As the financial crisis that hit hard the world economy originated from the U.S. it will be a proper attitude for the present U.S. administration to opt for the arms reduction, owning due responsibility for it.
					
					 If the U.S. is truly interested in ensuring the world peace, it should refrain from the actions of encouraging and escalating the new arms race.
					
					 However, the U.S. is behaving quite contrary to this. By doing so, it is revealing itself the fact that it is the most irresponsible country in ensuring the world peace and weathering the economic crisis and the root cause of sparking off arms race and the danger of war.
					
					 The U.S. is in the hostile relationship with the DPRK. Not a small share of the U.S. defense spending is channeled into the moves to threaten the DPRK militarily and invade it. 
					
					 It is, therefore, entirely just and essential for the DPRK to continue bolstering up its capability for self-defence to cope with the increasing U.S. military threat.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Put Inter-Korean Exchange and Cooperation under Control Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Put Inter-Korean Exchange and Cooperation under Control Assailed
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The "Broadcasting and Communication Committee" of south Korea recently decided to form "committee for promoting south-north broadcasting exchange", publicizing that it is aimed to "systematically push forward exchange and cooperation in the broadcasting field between the south and the north".
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 This is not aimed to promote genuine cooperation and exchange between media organizations in the north and the south but a revelation of the sinister design of the Lee Myung Bak "government" to cover up its anti-reunification and confrontational moves, put under control the progressive media organs' cooperation and exchange with the north and hamstring their efforts for them.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' anti-reunification and confrontational policy and stand of denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and refusing to implement them remain unchanged. Those who suppress progressive media persons standing for improved north-south relations and reunification and indiscriminately block their activities have the effrontery to call for the "promotion of broadcasting exchange between the south and the north" and "promotion of cooperation". This is nothing but sheer hypocrisy. 
					
					 The "Broadcasting and Communication Committee" was formed by traitor Lee for the purpose of rendering the media conservative and reptile in a bid to enforce fascist dictatorship and step up the traitorous policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Lee group is putting forward the committee in a bid to create impression that it is interested in broadcasting exchange between the south and the north. Meanwhile, it is seeking to put the cooperation and exchange to be conducted by the progressive media institutions of south Korea with the north under the direct control of the authorities and craftily abuse them for inciting anti-reunification acts and confrontation. This is, in the final analysis, nothing but a criminal move to scuttle pro-reunification and patriotic cooperation and exchange between media organizations in the north and the south under the signboard of "promotion of broadcasting exchange" and escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and the racket for putting media under its control.
					
					 The Lee group had better stop busing itself with such foolish and deceptive farce which will get it nowhere and lift a check bar dropped on the pro-reunification movement organizations of the north and the south.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Confrontation under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Confrontation under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea recently talked nonsense at an "emergency meeting of ministers related to security" that "there is no change in the principle of joining the PSI." In the meantime the puppet authorities are busy with working out a "plan" to implement the UNSC's decision on "sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 In this regard Minju Joson Wednesday carries a signed commentary, which says:
					
					 Such behavior is an unpardonable deed intended to drive the inter-Korean relations to the unpredictable worst phase and a revelation of wicked hysteria for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The PSI is a mechanism for aggression cooked up by the U.S. and its followers to stifle the countries incurring their displeasure, and its major target is the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' full participation in the PSI will be a very dangerous action as it may further escalate the confrontation between the north and the south and trigger off their armed conflict.
					
					 The Lee group's call for the above-said "plan" is a betrayal of its true colors as warmonger seeking to realize its wild ambition for aggression on the DPRK at any cost in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are going deeper into the worst phase in which a war may break out any moment, far from being restored, due to the Lee group's reckless moves for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee group should behave itself, mindful that such frantic anti-DPRK moves as call for full participation in the PSI and "implementation of the UN sanctions" would precipitate its own destruction.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Introduce Early Warning Satellite Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Introduce Early Warning Satellite Blasted
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries' intention to introduce an early warning satellite under the pretext of "threat" from someone is nothing but a crafty trick to justify their moves for turning the country into a military giant and launching reinvasion and cover up the danger of those moves, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a signed commentary.
					 The Japanese reactionaries claim that the early warning satellite does not threaten anyone as it is for "defense" but its introduction is evidently aimed to hold a military edge in outer space and mount a preemptive attack on other countries any moment, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Once their early warning satellite system is established, they will be fully ready for mounting preemptive attacks on other countries any moment. Herein lies the danger of the Japanese reactionaries' moves for establishing the early warning satellite system.
					
					 It is their strategic aim and invariable wild ambition to realize at any cost the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" by force which Japan failed to do in the past. 
					
					 It is a trite trick of the aggressors to provoke other countries, making far-fetched assertions whenever they ignite a war.
					
					 The international community is deeply concerned over the Japanese reactionaries' reckless moves to emerge a military power and launch reinvasion and following them with a high degree of vigilance. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries had better immediately stop the reckless moves for militarizing outer space which may harass world peace and security and spark off a fresh arms race and war.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates a signed article to the 18th anniversary of the publication of the famous work of General Secretary Kim Jong Il "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish."
					 The work deals with the idea and theories that socialism in the DPRK is socialism centred on the popular masses guided by the Juche idea, most advantageous and vital socialism of Korean style as it was chosen by the Korean people and built by their own efforts to suit the specific conditions of the country and invincible socialism based on the single-minded unity of the leader, the Party and the masses. 
					
					 The past 18 years since the publication of the work represent a glorious course in which the scientific accuracy and tremendous vitality of Korean-style socialism centred on the popular masses guided by the great Juche idea, Songun idea have been fully demonstrated, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Our socialism is great socialism and it is invincible socialism under which the entire army and all the people are single-mindedly united around the headquarters of the revolution and it is powerful socialism with matchless military muscle capable of firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					
					 The Songun idea is shedding its rays as guidelines for the revolution which remarkably enriched the treasure-house of the Juche idea and an all-powerful treasured sword for the victorious advance of socialism as it meets the requirements of the times when the role of an army is regarded more important than ever and the developing revolution. 
					
					 The DPRK has its own state structural system with the National Defence Commission as its mainstay, matchless and invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu, self-supporting and modern national defence industry, steel-like great army-people unity and others. All these icons of the dignity and might of our socialism would be unthinkable without the vitality of the Songun idea. 
					
					 The single-minded unity of the entire army and all the people around the headquarters of the revolution serves as powerful driving force guaranteeing the triumphant advance of socialism of Korean style. The slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the leadership of revolution headed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Il!" is enshrined by them as unshakable faith. 
					
					 The U.S.-led imperialists are running the whole gamut of despicable means to stifle our socialist system even by abusing the world body. This is, however, a foolish attempt.
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK will always remain an impregnable fortress as it has the military muscle powerful enough to frustrate at a single stroke the imperialists' strategy of strength and their move for aggression, concludes the article.

articles.title: U.S. Brazen-faced Pressure Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Brazen-faced Pressure Blasted in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on May 1 to condemn the United States for its brazen-faced action to pressurize the puppet authorities to pay rents for the houses of the families of the service members of the U.S. forces. 
					 The organization disclosed the fact that a business enterprise in charge of the construction of the houses for families of service members of the U.S. forces envisaged in the plan for the expansion of the base of the U.S. forces in Phyongthaek recently urged the U.S. forces side to cover the expenses for the operation and management of the houses for those families for 45 years but the side insisted that it would cover the expenses for 15 years only. 
					
					 As the contract with the enterprise was not concluded as desired by the U.S. forces side, it is pressurizing the south Korean authorities to stand guarantee for it in a bid to achieve its aim at any cost, the organization noted, and continued: 
					
					 The U.S. is putting pressure upon the south Korean authorities to pay even the rents for the above-mentioned houses, not content with having perpetrated the illegal act of using the money collected as taxes of south Koreans to cover the expenses for the relocation of its military bases according to its strategy. How brazen-faced this is. 
					
					 Recalling that the Lee Myung Bak "government" is set to meet the U.S. demand under the pretext of "strategic alliance", the organization warned that the people would never allow the regime to yield to such pressure after offering facilities to the U.S. troops. 
					
					 The organization strongly urged the U.S. to give up such pressure and, furthermore, stop the expansion of the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek.

articles.title: Protests against Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protests against Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan Unabated in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of all strata in south Korea staged protests in different parts of Seoul on April 30 against the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' killing of evacuees in Ryongsan.
					 The All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan held a press conference on the scene of tragedy in Ryongsan at which it deplored that though 100 days have passed since the tragedy, the Lee Myung Bak "government" has neither probed the truth behind the killing nor punished its chief culprits. 
					
					 Meanwhile, members of the organization conducted information service around "Chongwadae" demanding the probe into truth behind the tragedy and the punishment of the prime movers of the murder.
					
					 They urged Lee Myung Bak to apologize to the bereaved families of the dead and people and probe the truth behind the killing without delay.
					
					 Students affiliated to the "Preparatory Committee for National Student Actions" marched as far as the scene of the Ryongsan tragedy, assailing the authorities for meanly trying to cover up the truth about the incident. 
					
					 On the same day, the fascist police indiscriminately cracked down upon the participants in the protest and walked off at least ten evacuees and students to a police station. 
					
					 In this regard, the above-said committee issued an urgent statement. 
					
					 The statement declared it would bring the police's illegal and violent acts of violating human rights to the "human rights committee," etc. and stage a strong protest.

articles.title: Puppet Police's Suppression of Protesters Blasted
articles.content:
Puppet Police's Suppression of Protesters Blasted
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations of south Korea including the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the Solidarity for Progress and the Joint Conference of Human Rights Organizations held a press conference in Seoul on May 3 to condemn the puppet police authorities' brutal suppression of protesters. 
					 The press conference was held at the end of a fierce struggle against the riot police. Speakers at the conference accused the police of arresting at least 240 participants in the actions from April 30 to May 2.
					
					 The police went the lengths of blocking even the press conference by force, they stated, adding this suppression means that the Lee Myung Bak "government" would not lend an ear to the popular criticism of the unpopular rule. 
					
					 A press release read out at the conference noted that the police's brutal suppression which had been committed during the candlelight rallies held last year is now repeating itself, strongly demanding that those who ordered the violence be punished at once.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Launch of Satellite Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Launch of Satellite Supported
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Sok Myong Son, chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans, released a statement on April 29 in support of the DPRK's successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2. 
					 The statement said that the carrier rocket and satellite developed by the DPRK with its own wisdom and technology 100 per cent demonstrated once again the might of Songun Korea to the world as a shining achievement made in the drive to put the DPRK's space science and technology on a higher stage.
					
					 The compatriots residing abroad confidently see in the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 the rosy future of independent reunification, peace and prosperity, it said.
					
					 Reunified Korea will emerge the great prosperous and powerful country outstanding in the world in the real sense of word and the Korean nation will demonstrate its dignity as the strong nation that nobody dares to provoke, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Cherishing this pride and honor, all the officials of the confederation will do their utmost to arouse the compatriots to the nation-wide patriotic struggle for reunification.

articles.title: Struggle against Lee Myung Bak Group Urged
articles.content:
Struggle against Lee Myung Bak Group Urged
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement on May 3 in denunciation of the fascist action of the Lee Myung Bak group, which imposed heavy penalties on leading members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea after labeling it as an "enemy-benefiting organization" by dint of the notorious "National Security Law".
					 The statement said that the solidarity is a legitimate pro-reunification movement organization as it has taken the lead in the struggle to defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea and realize democracy there and achieve the reconciliation and unity between the north and the south.
					
					 The crackdown upon the solidarity and its leading members goes to prove that the Lee group's fascist violence for totally obliterating the pro-reunification movement organizations and progressive forces in south Korea has reached an extremely grave phase, it pointed out.
					
					 With this group left intact, the independent reunification movement will be violently trampled down in south Korea and the entire nation will face disaster, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The Koreans in China will more vigorously wage the struggle to foil the Lee group's brutal fascist suppression of the solidarity and other pro-reunification democratic forces from all walks of life in south Korea in the future, too.
					
					 The Lee group should immediately stop its crackdown upon the progressive pro-reunification movement organizations and release the unreasonably detained patriotic figures at once, mindful that if it persists in confrontation and fascism, going against the entire nation's desire for reunification, it will be doomed to self-destruction.

articles.title: UNSC's "Presidential Statement" Denounced
articles.content:
UNSC's "Presidential Statement" Denounced
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Nigeria, UK and Switzerland issued statements in denunciation of the "presidential statement" adopted by the UNSC over the DPRK's successful satellite launch.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in its statement on April 20 noted that the UNSC had never called any satellite launch of other countries to account in the history. The DPRK has the right to launch satellite for peaceful purposes like other countries do, it added.
					
					 The DPRK's war deterrent for self-defence should be steadily bolstered, the statement said, declaring that the Juche idea followers in Nigeria fully support the self-defensive steps taken by the DPRK.
					
					 The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain in its statement on April 21 branded the "presidential statement" of the UNSC as an unpardonable violation of the DPRK's sovereignty.
					
					 The branch fully supports the just decision made by the DPRK never to participate in the six-party talks but restore to their original state the nuclear facilities and bring their operation back on a normal track, the statement stressed.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee in its statement on April 25 said that to bolster up the war deterrent on the part of the DPRK is a just and legitimate, self-defensive measure to cope with the hostile forces' intensified threat and scheme for aggression.
					
					 The imperialist allied forces' moves against the DPRK can be smashed only by the military deterrence, the statement said, adding that the DPRK's bolstering of war deterrent is just.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona universidad de la Unidad No. 10215 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona universidad de la Unidad No. 10215 del EPC
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la universidad de la Unidad No. 10215 del EPC.
					  Ante todo, estuvo ante la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung, levantada en el plantel docente y recorrio guiado por el rector el monumento a la orientacion sobre el terreno del Presidente, la sala de educacion de la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					  Al recordar con gran emocion la orgullosa trayectoria de la universidad, senalo que gracias a la extraordinaria idea militar del Presidente y su sabia direccion, el EPC pudo fortalecerse como filas invencibles y prosiguio que las imborrables hazanas acumuladas por el Presidente estan registradas en letras doradas en la historia de construccion del EPC.
					
					  Acto seguido, se entero en detalles del estado de educacion recorriendo las aulas de estudios militares.
					
					  Se mostro satisfecho de que esta universidad realiza de manera sustancial la ensenanza de principios y movimientos a traves de varios medios visuales y equipos de laboratorio y practica bien preparados, de modo que todos los estudiantes asimilen perfectamente los autoctonos metodos de combate del PTC.
					
					  Subrayo que para formar a los estudiantes como comandantes competentes con ricos conocimientos militares y gran capacidad de mando, es necesario intensificar la ensenanza con ejemplos practicos y medios visuales, mejorar constantemente el contenido didactico conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo y elevar el papel de los profesores.
					
					 A continuacion, el Dirigente recorrio el interior y el exterior del plantel docente y elogio altamente el hecho de que se realizan sustancialmente varias labores politicas para intensificar la educacion revolucionaria y la clasista sobre los estudiantes y se plantaron muchos arboles en el recinto de la universidad y sus alrededores conforme al ambiente pedagogico.
					
					 Continuo que las instituciones de educacion militar debes estar al frente del cumplimiento de las lineas y politicas del partido.
					
					  Muy contento de que los profesores y empleados alcanzaron numerosos exitos al acondicionar bien la universidad desde el punto de vista pedagogico y cultural y dedicar toda su inteligencia y pasion a la formacion del personal clave del EPC, aprecio altamente sus meritos y presento las tareas programaticas que tiene por delante este plantel.
					
					  El Dirigente se fotografio junto a los profesores y empleados de la universidad.
					
					  Le acompanaron el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC y miembro del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, Jang Song Thaek, el general de ejercito del EPC, Ri Myong Su, y otros comandantes del EPC.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre los cancilleres de Corea y Cuba
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre los cancilleres de Corea y Cuba
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 4 en La Habana las conversaciones entre el canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun, quien preside la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de visita en Cuba, y su homologo de la Republica de Cuba, Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla.
					  En la ocasion participaron, por la parte coreana, los miembros de la delegacion y el embajador coreano en Cuba y, por la cubana, el vicecanciller y otros interesados.
					
					  Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el problema de desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y otros asuntos internacionales de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam parte de Pyongyang para visitar Sudafrica y Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam parte de Pyongyang para visitar Sudafrica y Zimbabwe
 Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, partio este miercoles de esta capital para visitar la Republica Sudafricana y la Republica de Zimbabwe.
					 Entre sus acompanantes figuran el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam y el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun.

articles.title: Corea toma medidas preventivas de la gripe A (H1N1)
articles.content:
Corea toma medidas preventivas de la gripe A (H1N1)
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ATCC) -- Muy alerto ante la gripe A (H1N1) que azota todo el mundo a una gran velocidad, el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea intensifica las labores preventivas.
					  El vicepresidente del Comite Estatal Emergente de Prevencion, Pak Myong Su, se entrevisto de ese tema con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea.
					
					La periodista: Cuales son las medidas estatales frente a la gripe de influenza porcina que esta difundiendose en Mexico, Estados Unidos y otros numerosos paises?
					
					 Pak: Por ahora, se realiza consecuentemente en las zonas fronterizas el chequeo medico sobre los extranjeros que entran en nuestro pais, en particular, los viajeros provenientes de las zonas donde fue brotada esa epidemia.
					
					 Luego, aparta a los sospechosos y los somete a la vigilancia medica hasta que se confirme que no se han contagiado.
					
					  Ademas, toma las medidas emergentes para procurar las medicinas antivirales frente al eventual brote de la epidemia e intensifica mas que nunca la cuarentena sobre los puercos, su carne y otros productos.
					
					  Al paralelo, se da buen impulso a los estudios para desarrollar la vacuna.
					
					  Por otra parte, informa con agilidad a traves de TV y publicaciones sobre el curso de brote de la gripe A (H1N1) en varios paises y el estado de propagacion.
					
					  Los funcionarios medicos realizan diariamente el examen medico sobre los habitantes en las zonas encargadas y se esmeran en la propaganda higienica para darles los conocimientos de referencia sobre la epidemia y ensenarles los metodos preventivos.
					
					  Se establecieron el sistema diagnostico para distinguir la gripe A(H1N1) de la comun y el otro informativo de la ocurrencia tanto en las entidades sanitarias centrales como en las locales.
					
					  La periodista: ?Se ha reportado hasta ahora algun caso de contagio en nuestro pais?
					
					  Pak: Ninguno.
